title: Another "not enough IP" when I have enough report.
body:
Just wanted to add another data point for Riot. I'm getting the "not enough IP" when trying to purchase in store. I have restarted the client as well and get the same issue. So it looks as though there are still some syncing issues lurking around somewhere. I am using the beta client. I'm trying to purchase the magic pen quint at 1025 IP. You'll notice in the picture the 515 IP rune is enabled, while the 1025+ runes are disabled.

http://imgur.com/a/LShp4

replies.body:
We've commonly seen this issue resolved after swapping over to the *Legacy Client* to complete the purchase. You can access the old client at any time from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this caused any change.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Lv34nzEl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-14T22:58:49.444+0000)
>
> We've commonly seen this issue resolved after swapping over to the *Legacy Client* to complete the purchase. You can access the old client at any time from the login screen:
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
> 
> Let me know if this caused any change.

I was finally able to purchase after a number of games. Judging from the screen shot below, what isn't updating/syncing correctly is the current IP I actually possess. That is, I thought I had more IP than I apparently did, but my IP available didn't reflect that. In fact playing further matches, the number would go up reflecting the IP gain. But at some point, either I spent some IP prior to trying to buy this rune, it didn't accurately reflect that deduction, or I gained some and it didn't add it. It's not a big deal, but something to pass on to the dev team.

http://imgur.com/O7XDn1e

You will note my total available IP displayed, 1464. The cost of the rune is 1025 IP. However it says my balance after buying said rune will be 215 IP, inferring that I actually have 1240 IP not 1464. After purchasing the rune AND after a restart, it still displays an apparently incorrect IP amount remaining of 439 IP. So somewhere some calculations are being pulled from different fields and those aren't syncing properly lol.
